short_description: citadel roofing and construction is a roofing contractor based in indianapolis, indiana, united states.
long_description:
citadel roofing and construction, llc is a full-service roofing company that specializes in total roof replacement and repair services. we serve central kentucky, southern indiana and the indianapolis area. let us assist you with your roofing and home improvement needs. the mission of citadel roofing and construction is to provide customers with excellent roofing and construction services. positivity – when problems arise we don't complain, we find a solution.
. dependability – we strive to always keep our promises, to say what we mean and mean what we say. serving most of kentucky and indiana. the commitment to quality and client satisfaction that we have as a company is the foundation of our organization. citadel installs high-performance construction materials that are virtually maintenance-free and fade-resistant.
generated_description: citadel roofing and construction, legally known as citadel roofing and construction llc., is a full-service roofing company based in shelbyville, kentucky. the company specializes in total roof replacement and repair services, serving central kentucky, southern indiana, and the indianapolis area. citadel roofing and construction uses high-quality materials and craftsmanship in all its products and services. the company is committed to providing excellent roofing and construction services, adhering to the highest levels of moral integrity and customer respect. the company is owned by bruce c. mitchell and jacob mattingly, both with extensive experience in the roofing industry. citadel roofing and construction also offers siding installation and seamless aluminum gutter services, ensuring durability and maintenance-free solutions for their clients.
